topic.title: Wi-Fi Connectivity â€“ Router SSID/Password Configuration

li.p: Under wireless network mode choose > Access point > Next
Provide any name to the router under SSID > Next > under security authentication > select Protected > enter any 8 character password under network key > Next
Under Wi-Fi > Basic settings > 2.4 GHz/5 GHz > Enter the required SSID > the required channel as per the premises > Apply
